DOC.brief_summary: Allow physicians to test the efficacy of arcoxia in patients with acute pain.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of acute pain susceptible of pharmacological treatment Greater than 18 years of age Voluntary acceptance to participate in the study and signature of the informed consent form Allergy to etoricoxib or any of its components Less than 18 years old Patient is taking anticoagulants Patient that already has taken any drug as analgesic
